name: Full Colour Lanyards - 20mm
description: For full colour dye sublimation lanyards, we use ultra fine silk like Polyester material, it can be printed edge to edge on 1 side or both sides! Full colour lanyards is a very specialized way of dying material that involves using high temperatures to transfer the dye onto the material, and it can be only the off white material.  Create your lanyard: (1) Select your lanyard colour (2) Select your free attachment (3) Add optional safety breakaway unit (4) Create your logo
productDisclaimer: GST additional. Other additional charges may apply. We reserve the right to change prices and charges without notice. Please supply or email logo in vectorised format in an EPS or PDF File. Current stocked item style may vary slightly from image shown. If item style is paramount then please request sample of current shipment prior to ordering. Delievery time from Dex Group to client is not included. Days stated means working days from artwork approval to dispatch.
